document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Amcathra Villa on Ilzantil Street.
document_data.name: Amcathra Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Amcathra Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Amcathra]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the central section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] in between the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] and [[Ilzantil Street]] just north of [[Tarnath Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: Amcathra Villa contained two buildings within the walled estate. The main building dwarfed the second building. They stood two and four stories tall.
